title.rendered: Vintage Ranch from Eldorado Stone earns coveted GOOD DESIGN™ Award

content.rendered:
SAN DIEGO, CA – Eldorado Stone has been named as one of the recipients of the prestigious, international GOOD DESIGN™ Award in 2017 for its innovative new wood plank stone veneer, Vintage Ranch. The award-winning profile captures the character and warmth of classic American barn wood in an easy-to-install panelized format, combining planks of varying height and depth to preserve the rich color tones and textures of naturally weathered oak, Douglas fir and pine.

“We’re thrilled to see Vintage Ranch recognized with a GOOD DESIGN Award, one of the most exclusive design accolades in the world,” said Sarah Lograsso, Director of Marketing. “We’ve been overwhelmed by the positive response we’ve seen from designers, architects and homeowners in the past year.”

TWEET THIS: #VintageRanch from @eldoradostone earns prestigious #GOODDESIGN Award from the @Chi_Athenaeum for its innovative take on naturally weathered, classic American barn wood in durable and splinter-free format. #stoneveneer bit.ly/ESVintageRanch

Vintage Ranch is made of concrete, which makes it much more durable than the aged barn wood from which it draws its inspiration. Each plank is carefully hand painted to display the patina of weather-worn boards, reflecting the unmatched beauty and depth of natural textures, and its rustic finishing details embody the enduring resilience of authentic wood.

In addition to receiving a GOOD DESIGN Award for 2017, Vintage Ranch was recently named a “Top 100 Product” by This Old House and a “Top 101 Product” from Building Design & Construction. The profile is available for purchase and comes in four color finishes: Saddlewood, Foxwood, Parchwood and Doverwood.

To learn more about Eldorado Stone and its products, visit eldoradostone.com.
